article_text:
Editor’s note: Each of the following items was taken from police reports at the separate law enforcement agencies.

Columbia Police

Department

Saturday, Nov. 27

Michael Anthony Norwood, 30, 917 Oak Park Drive, Columbia, was arrested and charged with domestic assault. He remained in Maury County Jail on Saturday without bond.

Earnest Eagle Loy, 40, 1055 Cliff White Road, Columbia, was charged with two counts of aggravated assault. He was jailed and released Saturday on $10,000 bond.

Tennessee Highway Patrol

Saturday, Nov. 27

James Jeffery Dickey, 33, 31 East Big Sr pings, Lawrenceburg, was arrested and charged with being a habitual motor vehicle offender. He was jailed and released Saturday on $7,500.
